short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Algohire Extension is a tool that helps you find the best candidates for your job openings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Algohire Talent Scout simplifies your hiring process by helping you collect candidate information from job platforms like LinkedIn and Naukri directly within your browser. With just a few clicks, you can extract key details such as the candidate’s name, email, phone number, and resume, streamlining data entry.

You can easily review and confirm the candidate’s information, select a job opening from your Algohire account, and even evaluate how well the candidate fits the role. Once everything is ready, add the candidate to your job listings without switching between tabs.

With Algohire Talent Scout, managing candidate profiles and speeding up your recruitment process has never been easier.
